messages.subject: visiting unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... We did this last April! The kids and I headed out for a road trip from our home in Utah. Along the way we stopped in to meet and stay with Karin in Phoenix
messages.messageBody:
>>I dream of taking vacations when my kids are older and staying at other
>>homeschooler's homes instead of in motels.>>

We did this last April! The kids and I headed out for a road trip from our
home in Utah. Along the way we stopped in to meet and stay with Karin in
Phoenix and Sandra in Albuquerque. It was a great experience. We also flew
to NY in June for a family wedding and arranged a get together with Joyce
and AnneO in the city. Another fabulous experience for all of us. I highly
recommend meeting other unschooling families from this list and the message
boards.

Life is good.
~Mary
